name: Lawan
description:
lawan: (verb) means 'fight' in the Malay language.
the hashtag #lawan in Malaysia began as a protest of the government's handling of the Covid-19 pandemic.
Black flags are used to signify the #lawan movement.
White flags are used by those in need to signify to neighbours or passers-by that they need help, as many have lost their income. Caring citizens are quick to react and lend help where they see the white flags.
The government began cracking down on those who displayed these flags.
